text:
="preserve">Robert Chabbal (6 February 1927 – 14 September 2020) was a French physician and scientific researcher. He was Director General of the French National Centre for Scientific Research (CNRS) from 1976 to 1979. From 1980 to 1983, Chabbal worked at NATO as Deputy Secretary General for Scientific Affairs.
Chabbal died on 14 September 2020, aged 93.

annotations.surface_form: French National Centre for Scientific Research
